data.event: The Town of Amherst was founded in 1807.

event.title: was separated from Amherst County in 1807

data.event: Once Nelson County was separated from Amherst County in 1807, the community became the seat of the Amherst County Government.

event.title: April 15, 1910, the Town of Amherst was incorporated

data.event: On April 15, 1910, the Town of Amherst was incorporated by the order of the Circuit Court.

event.title: was granted to the town by the General Assembly in 1950

data.event: A charter was granted to the town by the General Assembly in 1950.

event.title: Approximately six months later Cruea returned

data.event: Approximately six months later Cruea returned to the Town and delivered a framed original of a proposed Town seal.
